object.name: InlineKeyboardMarkup
object.description: This object represents an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to.
object.html_description: This object represents an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to.
object.rst_description: This object represents an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_ that appears right next to the message it belongs to.

annotations.description: Array of button rows, each represented by an Array of InlineKeyboardButton objects

annotations.rst_description: Array of button rows, each represented by an Array of :class:`aiogram.types.inline_keyboard_button.InlineKeyboardButton` objects
